channel.title: RunePk Beta
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR="#1589FF"]Rune[/COLOR][COLOR="#F75D59"]PK[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#E0FFFF"]Your memories are now present[/COLOR]
Finally, really happy to say this.. [CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]!BETA ONLINE![/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#00FFFF"]Homepage: [url=http://rpkhighscores.co.nr/]Homepage[/url] Download/Play: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/RunePK.jar]Download[/url][/CENTER][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3][COLOR="#F75D59"]Introduction:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][COLOR="#1589FF"]Hey guys, I'm simply working on remaking Rune[COLOR="#F75D59"]PK[/COLOR]. I know there's a lot of hate on the server,but i personally loved the server. I've always wanted to remake the server and now i finally have the chance to. This thread will just keep track of how much progress i'm making. If you've ever played it ( It came out around May 2012 ) You already know what to expect, If you haven't then I'm happy to inform you that you have another opportunity to experience this great server. The only real issues with the server was Jamie. Worst staff member ever, selling 99's for skills that weren't even out yet, disrespectful, and basically a big prick, I'm sure we can all agree on that. Sure there was a few holes in the server, and flaws, but the game play made up for it. I know i may receive some hate for remaking this, but i'm doing this to remake the fun experience i had[/COLOR].[/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Website;[COLOR="#00FF00"]Working[/COLOR] Client & jar; [COLOR="#00FF00"]Working[/COLOR] Webclient;[COLOR="#F62217"] Not working[/COLOR] Server; [COLOR="#00FF00"]Working[/COLOR] [/FONT] [CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]!BETA ONLINE![/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#00FFFF"]Homepage: [url=http://rpkhighscores.co.nr/]Homepage[/url] Download/Play: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/RunePK.jar]Download[/url][/CENTER][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#1589FF"]Videos of the original RunePK;[/COLOR] [SPOIL][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bWGtNmIUHy0]Redweed Pk Video (Runepk) - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VgytgIULyU]RunePk - Pking Event HighLights - JOIN TODAY - - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJGDm1jYwT8]Tesco K - RunePk Server -- Runescape 2007 Pking -- Stable Eco -- - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxj8Hu3ypJA]Triple Kill RunePk - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ekaYzwUllds]â–º Kids Awake â—„ VID 1 Maxed Pure ll Whip ll Rsps ll RunePk ll Oldschool Hybrid ll - YouTube[/url][/SPOIL]
[COLOR="#1589FF"]The remake images;[/COLOR]
[SPOIL] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/welcome.png[/img] [B]Barrows ( The arrow above the barrows brothers work ) [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/yep.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk1.png[/img] General store replicated 100% (Excluding the enchanted gem) [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk2.png[/img] [B]100% Shop locations, including the PK point shop[/B] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk3.png[/img] 100% Custom clue scrolls [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk4.png[/img] Same replicated dungeon Teleports with only 3 options [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk5.png[/img] 100% Brimhaven dungeon, Also new NPC models with correct animations [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk6.png[/img] Skilling (remember the slayer master over there? The agility,the thieving? The ores around the bank? Memories :) [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk7.png[/img] Bandits with correct animations (using the block animation in the picture) [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk8.png[/img] Treasure trails, the dialogue shows a casket on the left side on the dialogue [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk9.png[/img] Treasure trails, the dialogue shows a clue scroll on the left side [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk10.png[/img] Rewards with correct reward screen! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/runepk11.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/New%20folder/brb.png[/img] Website (under construction)[/B] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/1233.png[/img][/SPOIL]
[COLOR="#1589FF"][SIZE=5][CENTER]Today's updates[/CENTER][/SIZE] [CENTER](May, 12 Happy Mother's day!)[/CENTER][/COLOR] [update][/update] [COLOR="#1589FF"]DFS works, with charges.[/COLOR] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/41695164/project%20thread/dfs4.png[/img] [COLOR="#1589FF"]Combat based clue's have been added.[/COLOR] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6AJid6OMLs]Runepk - YouTube[/url] [COLOR="#1589FF"]Agility now working with shortcuts ^_^[/COLOR] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UxuM7s5o0Tw&feature=youtu.be]Agility - YouTube[/url] (Small update, all dragons except for babies now breathe fire) [center] [style]
[B][U]History of RunePK;[/U][/B]
RunePK was a somewhat popular server that was released around May 2012, The owners ( Jamie and Jake) were both brothers and their goal was to make a half Pk and a half Remake server, they didn't bring anything new to the RSPS community,but simply refined the best parts of a RSPS in my opinion. They reached around a 100+ Player base daily. Jake was a very quiet but kind Owner. Jamie was very aggressive and cocky,which leaded to the downfall of the server,with players abusing a cheat client released by Nando ( [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/410229-runepk-cheatclient.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/410229-runepk-cheatclient.html[/url] ) getting billions,dupes left and right the server fell. Due to how ruined the economy began they had no choice but to shut down, although controversial they said they were shut down by Jagex. They soon came back on Youtube informing that they are making a new server called "Reviry" which has not come out to this day.
Posting this to try and help bugs be found for austin.
[/CENTER][/style]

Finally, really happy to say this…

[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Homepage: Homepage
Download/Play: Download[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[SIZE=3][COLOR="#F75D59"]Introduction:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][COLOR="#1589FF"]Hey guys, I’m simply working on remaking Rune[COLOR="#F75D59"]PK[/COLOR]. I know there’s a lot of hate on the server,but i personally loved the server. I’ve always wanted to remake the server and now i finally have the chance to. This thread will just keep track of how much progress i’m making. If you’ve ever played it ( It came out around May 2012 ) You already know what to expect, If you haven’t then I’m happy to inform you that you have another opportunity to experience this great server. The only real issues with the server was Jamie. Worst staff member ever, selling 99’s for skills that weren’t even out yet, disrespectful, and basically a big prick, I’m sure we can all agree on that. Sure there was a few holes in the server, and flaws, but the game play made up for it. I know i may receive some hate for remaking this, but i’m doing this to remake the fun experience i had[/COLOR].[/FONT]

History of RunePK;

RunePK was a somewhat popular server that was released around May 2012, The owners ( Jamie and Jake) were both brothers
and their goal was to make a half Pk and a half Remake server, they didn’t bring anything new to the RSPS community,but simply
refined the best parts of a RSPS in my opinion. They reached around a 100+ Player base daily. Jake was a very quiet but kind Owner.
Jamie was very aggressive and cocky,which leaded to the downfall of the server,with players abusing a cheat client released by Nando
( http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/410229-runepk-cheatclient.html ) getting billions,dupes left and right the server fell. Due to how ruined the economy began they had no choice but to shut down,
although controversial they said they were shut down by Jagex. They soon came back on Youtube informing
that they are making a new server called “Reviry” which has not come out
to this day.

Posting this to try and help bugs be found for austin.

[/CENTER][/style]
